acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Harry E. Stam, date unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1973.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Established in 1784, the Town of North Hempstead is one of three towns comprising the present-day County of Nassau in Long Island.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: One tax assessment roll for the Town of North Hempstead in Long Island, dating from 1846. The roll contains an alphabetical list of North Hempstead residents, with information on each resident's acreage, real estate, personal estate, and the amount of tax owed. Also included are lists of non-residents and resident African Americans. The roll was compiled by John C. Mott, Collector of North Hempstead.
